LanguageData.VenomFangs.label: venom fangs
LanguageData.VenomFangs.description: An installed set of venom fangs.
LanguageData.VenomFangs.comps.0.tools.0.label: venom fangs
LanguageData.VenomTalon.label: venom talon
LanguageData.VenomTalon.comps.0.tools.0.label: venom talon
LanguageData.BloodRot.label: blood rot
LanguageData.BloodRot.description: A slow-growing bacterial disease. The bacteria have little effect on the victim during their growing phase, but upon reaching saturation levels will induce a toxin storm that leads to immediate death.\n\nThe body's immune system will clear blood rot eventually, so the standard treatment is to use normal medicine to suppress it until that happens. Glitterworld doctors can use a massive mechanite dose to clear the infection immediately, but it is expensive.
LanguageData.BloodRot.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.BloodRot.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.BloodRot.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.Abasia.label: paralytic abasia
LanguageData.Abasia.description: A condition that makes a person unable to walk by interfering with the motor cortex. After enough time, patients recover naturally as the brain rewires itself, but the process is slow. There is also a chance of a lucky early recovery. This illness can be completely cured with a special procedure, but the procedure requires large amounts of glitterworld medicine.
LanguageData.PsychicAmplifier.label: psylink
LanguageData.PsychicAmplifier.description:
An organic connection to a larger psychic field. This allows a person to use specific psychic powers that they have learned to influence reality in ways that seem impossible.

Higher levels of psylink permit the use of more powers. Regardless of psylink level, a person can only use specific powers that they have learned.

Psylink comes from a variety of sources. Single-use psylink neuroformer devices can create a psylink. Tribal peoples also know how to develop it through ritual linking with psychically-connected lifeforms.

As a physical phenomenon in the brain, psylink is poorly-understood by scientists, not least because it seems to actively conceal itself if studied too closely. One thing most agree on is that it somehow connects people to archotechs and harnesses their power, possibly through some sort of negotiation or sympathy mechanism.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.label: neural heat
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.description: Despite being called "heat", neural heat is not a measure of temperature. It refers to a type of chaotic psychic energy in the mind which is built up when using psychic powers and dissipates over the course of a few seconds or minutes.\n\nIf neural heat is pushed past normal limits, it may cause temporary psychic breakdown and unconsciousness due to psychic shock. These conditions don't cause permanent damage.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.0.label: safe
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.1.label: overloaded
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.2.label: very overloaded
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.4.label: overwhelming
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.label: psychic breakdown
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.description: Deep psychic destabilization of the mind. Psychic breakdown last for days, causing mental disturbances of various kinds. It resolves itself with time.
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.2.label: total
LanguageData.PsychicAnesthesia.label: psychic anesthesia
LanguageData.PsychicBurden.label: psychic burden
LanguageData.PsychicBlindness.label: psychic blindness
LanguageData.PsychicVertigo.label: psychic vertigo
LanguageData.PsychicVertigo.description: Psychically-induced loss of spatial orientation. This will cause flesh creatures to vomit.
LanguageData.PsychicFocus.label: psychic focus
LanguageData.PsychicFocus.description: Psychically-induced mental focus, increasing sight, hearing and movement capactities.
LanguageData.PsychicInvisibility.label: psychic invisibility
LanguageData.PsychicInvisibility.description: Psychically-induced invisibility. This actually affects others nearby, making their brains unable to perceive the sight of this individual, even if the eyes are unaffected.
LanguageData.EntropyLink.label: entropy link
LanguageData.EntropyLink.description: A psychic link with another individual. Gain or loss of neural heat incurred by one will be shared equally between both.
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.label: joyfuzz
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.description: Psychically-induced feelings of warmth, comfort, and acceptance. This improves mood, but the lack of negative stimulation induces a mild stupor and reduces consciousness.
LanguageData.PsychicLove.label: psychic love
LanguageData.PsychicLove.description: Psychically-induced romantic desire. This increases an individual's opinion of someone else, and increases the likelihood of romantic advances and marriage proposals, while reducing the chance of a breakup.
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.label: psychic suppression
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.description: The effect of a psychic suppression field. Coordination and reasoning are muddled.
LanguageData.NoPain.label: psychic painlessness
LanguageData.NoPain.description: Pain is disabled by the psychic influence of a wielded weapon.
LanguageData.SpeedBoost.label: psychic speed
LanguageData.SpeedBoost.description: Movement is sped up by the psychic influence of a wielded weapon.
LanguageData.HungerMaker.label: psychic hunger
LanguageData.HungerMaker.description: Hunger is increased by the psychic influence of a bonded weapon.
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.label: assisted neural cooling
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.description: Neural heat dissipation is improved by the psychic influence of a bonded weapon.
